name: CLM_CVR_VR_HX_INFO
description: This table contains contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR) void or resubmit history information.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CVR_VR_HX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR) resubmission or void history type.

columns.name: CVR_VR_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: Contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR) resubmission or void history user ID.

columns.name: CVR_VR_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CVR_VR_HX_TIME
columns.description: Contraceptive vaginal ring (CVR) resubmission or void history time stamp.
